Lub nplajteb yuav raug txom nyem lauj vem tim tej kws ua rua tuabneeg ua txhum. Yeej yuav tsum muaj tej yaam ua kuas ua txhum, tassws tug kws ua rua lwm tug ua txhum yuav raug txom nyem lauj!

Yog koj txhais teg lossws koj txhais kwtaw ua rua koj ua txhum, ca le muab txav pov tseg. Koj txawm nqws teg nqws taw los koj tau txujsa kuj zoo dua koj muaj ob saab teg ob saab taw es raug muab nrum rua huv qhov suavtawg moog ib txhws.
Yog koj lub qhov muag ua rua koj ua txhum, ca le muab kaus pov tseg. Koj muaj ib saab qhov muag xwb los tau txujsa kuj zoo dua koj muaj ob saab qhov muag es raug muab nrum rua huv ntuj tawg kub.”

“Ca le ceev faaj zoo tsw xob saib tsw taug cov mivnyuas yau nuav ib tug twg, tsua qhov kuv has rua mej tas, cov tubkhai ntuj kws tsom kwm puab naj nub nyob ntawm kuv leej Txwv kws nyob sau ntuj lub xubndag.
“Mej xaav le caag? Yog ib tug yawm muaj ib puas tug yaaj mas ib tug yuam kev pluj lawm, nwg yuav tsw tseg cuaj caug cuaj tug yaaj rua peg roob es moog nrhav tug kws yuam kev hov lov?
Yog nwg nrhav tau, kuv qha tseeb rua mej tas, nwg yuav zoo sab xyiv faab rua tug hov heev dua cuaj caug cuaj tug kws tsw yuam kev.
Ib yaam nkaus le nuav kuv leej Txwv kws nyob sau ntuj tsw xaav ca cov mivnyuas yau nuav ib tug twg puam tsuaj le.
“Yog koj ib tug kwvtij ua txhum rua koj ca le moog qha nwg qhov txhum rua nwg, meb ob leeg sws has xwb. Yog nwg noog koj has, koj yuav tau koj tug kwvtij rov qaab lug.
Yog nwg tsw noog koj has, koj ca le coj ib leeg ob leeg nrug koj moog hab, sub txhad muaj ob peb tug timkhawv pum tas txhua lu lug muaj tseeb.

Yog nwg tsw yeem noog puab cov ntawd has, ca le moog qha rua pawg ntseeg. Yog nwg tsw yeem noog pawg ntseeg has hab, koj ca le suav tas nwg zoo ib yaam le lwm haiv tuabneeg lossws yog ib tug tuabneeg sau se.
“Kuv qha tseeb rua mej tas, mej txwv yaam twg  huv lub nplajteb yaam hov kuj raug txwv sau ntuj, koj tso ncauj  yaam twg huv lub nplajteb yaam hov kuj raug tso ncauj sau ntuj hab.
Hab dua ib yaam, kuv has rua mej tas, yog mej ob leeg kws nyob huv nplajteb has hum koom sab thov ib yaam daabtsw, kuv leej Txwv kws nyob sau ntuj yuav pub yaam ntawd rua mej.
Muaj ob leeg peb leeg tuaj ua ke huv kuv lub npe, kuv nyob huv plawv puab hov ntawd.”
Thaus ntawd Petu txawm txaav lug has rua Yexu tas, “Tug Tswv, yog kuv tug kwvtij pheej ua txhum rua kuv, kuv yuav zaam txem rua nwg pes tsawg zag? Txug xyaa zag lov?”
Yexu has rua nwg tas, “Kuv tsw yog has tas xyaa zag xwb, tassws yog xyaa tug xyaa caum zag.
Vem le nuav Ntuj Ceeb Tsheej pev ib yaam nkaus le ib tug vaajntxwv kws xaam nuj nqes rua nwg cov qhev.
Thaus nwg chiv xaam, puab txawm coj ib tug qhev kws tshuav ib vaam talaa nyaj  lug rua nwg.
Vem tug qhev hov them tsw tau tes nwg tug lospaav txawm has kuas muab nwg hab nwg quaspuj mivnyuas hab txhua yaam kws nwg muaj muag huvsw coj lug them nuj nqes.
Tug qhev hov txawm khwb nkaus pe thov nwg has tas, ‘Yawm hlub, thov ua sab ntev es kuv yuav them huvsw.’
Tug lospaav khuvleej txhad tso nwg moog hab zaam tej nuj nqes hov.
Thaus tug qhev hov tawm moog nwg ntswb ib tug qhev kws yog nwg tuab paab kws tshuav nwg ib puas ntenali  tes nwg txawm ntsab nkaus tug hov nyem cej daab has tas, ‘Ca le them tej kws koj tshuav kuv.’
Tug qhev hov txawm khwb nkaus thov has tas, ‘Thov ua sab ntev es kuv yuav them.’
Tassws nwg tsw yeem le, txawm coj tug qhev hov moog kaw txug thaus them nqe taag.
Thaus nwg tuab paab tub qhe hov pum tej xwm txheej ntawd, puab nyuaj sab heev, txhad moog pav txhua yaam xwm txheej hov rua puab tug lospaav noog.
Tug lospaav txhad hu tug tub qhe hov lug hab has rua nwg tas, ‘Koj tug nam qhev phem, kuv tub zaam koj tej nuj nqes huvsw vem koj thov kuv.
Tsw tswm nyog koj khuvleej koj tuab paab tub qhe ib yaam le kuv tau khuvleej koj lawm lov?’
Mas tug lospaav npau tawg txawm muab tug qhev hov cob rua cov ceev xwm tswm txom moog txug thaus them nqe taag huvsw.
Kuv leej Txwv Ntuj yuav ua ib yaam le ntawd rua mej txhua tug, yog tas mej tsw ua lub sab dawb paug zaam txem rua mej tej kwvtij.”
Thaus Yexu has tej lug nuav taag lawm, nwg txawm tawm ntawm Kalilai moog rua huv Yutia lub xeev kws nyob dej Yalatee saab tid,
hab muaj tuabneeg coob coob lawv nwg qaab moog, mas nwg khu puab tej mob zoo huvsw hov ntawd.
Cov Falixai txawm txaav lug swm Yexu nug has tas, “Yog tug quasyawg twg muab nwg tug quaspuj nrauj tsw has yog tim txuj twg kuj xwj mas raug txuj kevcai los tsw raug?”
Yexu teb tas, “Mej tsw tau nyeem lov? Tug kws tswm tuabneeg chiv keeb thau u nwg tswm kuas muaj txwvneej hab quaspuj,
hab has tas, ‘Vem le nuav tug txwvneej yuav ncaim ntawm nwg nam nwg txwv hab nrug nwg tug quaspuj tsheej xeeb ua ke mas ob tug koom ua ib lub cev.’
Ob tug txhad tsw ua ob lub cev tassws koom ua ib lub cev xwb. Vem le nuav yaam kws Vaajtswv muab lu tsheej xeeb ua ke lawm, tuabneeg tsw xob muab ua kuas ncaim.”
Puab has rua Yexu tas, “Yog le ntawd ua caag Mauxe has kuas ua ntawv nrauj cev rua tug quaspuj hab muab nwg nrauj tau?”
Yexu has rua puab tas, “Mauxe kheev kuas mej nrauj quaspuj tau vem yog mej lub sab tawv, tassws chiv keeb thau u yeej tsw muaj le ntawd.
Kuv has rua mej tas, leejtwg nrauj quaspuj tsw yog tim qhov kws deev hluas nraug es moog yuav dua quaspuj tshab, kuj yog ua txhum kev nkauj nraug.”
Cov thwjtim has rua nwg tas, “Yog ua txwj nkawm zoo le ntawd, tes tsw xob sws yuav kuj zoo dua.”
Yexu has rua puab tas, “Tsw yog txhua tug txais yuav tej lug nuav, tsuas yog tug kws Vaajtswv pub kuas ua tau lawv le txhad txais yuav xwb.

Vem tas qee leej yeej ua nraug saam txwj thaus yug lug, qee leej yog tuabneeg muab saam hab qee leej ua nraug saam vem yog nwg xaam pum ntuj ceeb tsheej. Leejtwg txais yuav tau tej lug nuav kuj txais yuav moog.”
Thaus ntawd muaj tuabneeg coj cov mivnyuas yau tuaj cuag Yexu xaav kuas nwg tsaa teg npuab hab thov Vaajtswv paab. Tassws cov thwjtim txwv puab.
Yexu txawm has tas, “Ca cov mivnyuas yau lug cuag kuv, tsw xob taav puab, tsua qhov Ntuj Ceeb Tsheej yog cov kws zoo le cov mivnyuas yau nuav tug.”
Thaus nwg tsaa teg npuab cov mivnyuas hov taag lawm nwg txawm tawm qhov ntawd moog.
Muaj ib tug tuaj has rua Yexu tas, “Xwbfwb, kuv yuav tsum ua yaam zoo twg kuv txhad tau txujsa ib txhws tsw kawg?”
Yexu has rua nwg tas, “Koj nug kuv txug yaam kws zoo ua daabtsw? Tug kws zoo tsuas muaj ib tug xwb. Yog koj xaav tau txujsa, ca le tuav rawv tej kevcai.”
Tug hov has rua Yexu tas, “Yog nqai kevcai twg?” Yexu has tas, “Tsw xob tua tuabneeg, tsw xob deev luas quaspuj luas quasyawg, tsw xob ua tub saab, tsw xob ua cuav timkhawv,
koj yuav tsum fwm koj nam koj txwv hab koj yuav tsum hlub kwvtij zej zog ib yaam le koj hlub koj tug kheej.”
Tug hluas hov has rua Yexu tas, “Tej nqais kod kuv tub coj txhua yaam lawm, kuv tseed tu ncua daabtsw hab?”

Yexu has rua nwg tas, “Yog koj xaav ua tug kws zoo kawg nkaus, ca le moog muab koj tej hov txhua chaw muag es muab faib rua cov tuabneeg pluag, koj txhad le muaj nyaj txag sau ntuj ceeb tsheej, hab ca le lug lawv kuv qaab.”
Thaus tug hluas hov nov tej lug nuav nwg txawm tawm moog nyuaj sab kawg vem nwg muaj cuab txhaj cuab taam ntau heev.
Yexu has rua nwg cov thwjtim tas, “Kuv has tseeb rua mej tas, tug nplua nuj ceblaaj nkaag tau rua huv ntuj ceeb tsheej.
Kuv has rua mej tas, ib tug ntxhuav nkaag lub qhov koob yoojyim dua tug nplua nuj nkaag rua huv Vaajtswv lub tebchaws.”
Thaus cov thwjtim nov le hov kuj xaav tsw thoob txhad has tas, “Yog le hov, leejtwg yuav dim tau?”
Yexu tsaa muag saib rua puab mas has rua puab tas, “Tuabneeg ua tsw tau yaam nuav, tassws Vaajtswv ua tau txhua yaam huvsw.”
Mas Petu teb Yexu tas, “Peb tub tso txhua yaam tseg lawv koj tuaj. Peb yuav tau daabtsw?”

Yexu has rua puab tas, “Kuv has tseeb rua mej tas, thaus Tuabneeg leej Tub nyob tsawg sau nwg lub zwm txwv kws ci ntsaa ab huv lub nplajteb tshab, mej cov kws lawv kuv qaab yuav tau nyob tsawg sau kaum ob lub zwm txwv txav txem rua kaum ob xeem Yixayee.
Txhua tug kws tso vaaj tse kwvtij nkauj muam nam txwv mivnyuas laj teb tseg vem yog saib rua kuv lub npe, mas yuav tau quas pua npaug hab yuav tau txujsa ntev moog ib txhws.
Tassws muaj ntau leej kws ua thawj yuav rov ua tug tom tw, hab tug tom tw yuav tau ua tug thawj.”
“Ntuj Ceeb Tsheej pev ib yaam le tug tswv teb sawv ntxuv moog ndav zug tu nwg lub vaaj txwv maab.
Thaus has hum ib nub ib ntenalia  rua cov tub zug lawm nwg txawm tso puab moog ua num huv lub vaaj txwv maab.
Thaus kwvlaam cuaj teev nwg pum dua ib co tuabneeg nyob dawb tom tshaav puam,
nwg txawm has rua puab tas, ‘Mej ca le moog ua num huv lub vaaj txwv maab hab, kuv yuav muab nqe zug kuas tswm nyog rua mej.’ Tes puab txawm moog.
Thaus kwvlaam taav su hab thaus nub qaij peb teev nwg kuj ua ib yaam le thawj zag.
Thaus kwvlaam nub qaij tswb teev nwg moog pum dua ib co nyob dawb tes nwg txawm has rua puab tas, ‘Mej nyob dawb ntawm nuav ib nub tsaus ntuj ua daabtsw?’
Puab has rua nwg tas, ‘Vem tsw muaj leejtwg ndav peb.’ Nwg txawm has rua puab tas, ‘Mej ca le moog ua num huv lub vaaj txwv maab hab.’
“Thaus tsaus ntuj tug tswv vaaj has rua tug kws saib tub zug tas, ‘Hu cov tub zug lug hab muab nqe zug rua puab, xub muab rua cov kws tuaj ua qaab kawg le muab zuj zug rua cov kws xub tuaj.’
Thaus cov kws tuaj ua num kwvlaam nub qaij tswb teev lug mas puab tau nqe zug ib leeg ib ntenalia.
Thaus cov kws xub tuaj lug mas puab xaav has tas puab yuav tau ntau dua ntawd, tassws kuj tau ib leeg ib ntenalia xwb.
Thaus puab tau lawd puab txawm ywg tug tswv teb
has tas, ‘Cov kws tuaj tom qaab kawg nuav tau ua num ib teev xwb los koj saib puab sws luag le peb cov kws ua num khwv tiv tshaav ntuj ib nub le.’
Nwg teb cov tuabneeg hov ib tug tas, ‘Kwvluag 'e, tsw yog kuv ua tsw ncaaj rua koj. Koj yeej nrug kuv has hum tas ib nub ib ntenalia los tsw yog?
Ca le txais koj tug nqe zug moog lauj. Kuv yeej xaav muab rua tug kws tuaj ua qaab kawg ib yaam le muab rua koj.
Kuv tsw muaj cai swv kuv le nyaj txag lawv le kuv xaav lov? Ua caag koj yuav khib qhov kws kuv ua sab daav?’
Ib yaam le ntawd tug tom tw yuav rov ua tug thawj, hab tug thawj yuav rov ua tug tom tw.”
Thaus Yexu saamswm taug kev moog peg Yeluxalee, nwg coj nwg kaum ob tug thwjtim lug has tuabywv rua puab tas,
“Saib nawj, peb saamswm moog nraag Yeluxalee, mas Tuabneeg leej Tub yuav raug muab cob rua cov pov thawj hlub hab cov xwbfwb qha Vaajtswv kevcai, mas puab yuav txav txem tuag rua nwg,
hab muab nwg cob rua lwm haiv tuabneeg thuaj luag hab nplawm hab muab teem rua sau khaublig ntoo, mas peb nub nwg yuav raug muab tsaa caj sawv rov lug.”
Thaus ntawd Xenpenti tug quaspuj coj nwg ob tug tub tuaj cuag Yexu hab pe ntawm Yexu xubndag thov ib yaam ntawm Yexu.

Yexu txhad has rua nwg tas, “Koj xaav yuav daabtsw?” Nwg teb Yexu tas, “Thov koj tso cai rua kuv ob tug tub nuav ib tug nyob tsawg ntawm koj saab xws ib tug nyob ntawm koj saab phem rua huv koj lub tebchaws.”
Tassws Yexu teb tas, “Meb tsw paub tas meb thov daabtsw. Lub khob kws kuv yuav haus, meb haus tau lov?” Ob tug has rua Yexu tas, “Tau los maj.”

Yexu has rua ob tug tas, “Meb yeej yuav tau haus kuv lub khob, tassws qhov kws nyob tsawg ntawm kuv saab xws hab ntawm kuv saab phem kuv tsw yog tug kws pub tau, tassws kuv leej Txwv npaaj ca rua leejtwg, tug hov txhad tau xwb.”
Thaus kaum tug thwjtim nov le ntawd puab kuj chim rua ob tug kwvtij.
Yexu hu puab suavdawg lug has rua puab tas, “Mej yeej paub tas lwm haiv tuabneeg cov kws ua thawj yeej kaav rawv cov pejxeem, hab cov kws ua hlub yeej muaj fwjchim tswjfwm puab.
Mej cov yuav tsw thooj le ntawd. Mej cov leejtwg xaav ua tug hlub tug hov yuav tsum ua koom rua mej,
hab mej cov leejtwg xaav ua tug thawj, tug hov yuav tsum ua mej tug qhev,
ib yaam le Tuabneeg leej Tub tsw yog lug rua leejtwg ua koom, tassws nwg lug ua koom rua puab, hab pub nwg txujsa ua nqe txhwv tuabneeg coob coob.”
Thaus puab tawm huv lub moos Yelikhau moog muaj tuabneeg coob coob lawv puab qaab moog.
Mas muaj ob tug yawm dig muag nyob tsawg ntawm ntug kev. Thaus nov tas Yexu taug kev tuaj ob tug txawm qw has tas, “Tug Tswv kws yog  Tavi tug Tub 'e, thov khuvleej ib lauj!”
Cov tuabneeg hov txawm txwv ob tug kuas nyob tuabywv, los ob tug yimfuab qw has tas, “Tug Tswv kws yog Tavi tug Tub 'e, thov khuvleej ib lauj!”
Yexu txawm nreg nkaus hu ob tug lug has tas, “Meb xaav kuas kuv ua daabtsw rua meb?”
Ob tug has rua nwg tas, “Tug Tswv, thov qheb ib le qhov muag kuas pum kev.”
Yexu taab ncuab ob tug txhad kov ob tug qhov muag, tes taamswm ntawd ob tug txawm rov pum kev hab lawv Yexu qaab moog.
Thaus puab tuaj ze lub nroog Yeluxalee hab tuaj txug lub zog Npefake ntawm lub roob Txwv Aulib, Yexu txawm khaiv ob tug thwjtim moog,
hab has rua ob tug tas, “Meb ca le moog rua lub zog kws nyob tom hauv ntej, mas taamswm ntawd meb yuav pum ib tug neeg luav khi ca hab muaj ib tug mivnyuas nrug. Ca le daws caab lug rua kuv.
Yog leejtwg has le caag rua meb, meb ca le has tas, ‘Tug tswv cheem tsum swv,’ tes luas yuav tso plhuav rua meb coj lug taamswm ntawd.”
Tej nuav tshwm lug sub txhad ua tav lawv le tej lug kws tug xwbfwb cev lug has tas,
“Ca le has rua Xi‑oo tug ntxhais has tas, ‘Saib maj, koj tug vaajntxwv saamswm lug cuag koj. Nwg txu nwg tug fwjchim hab caij ib tug neeg luav lug, yog caij mivnyuas neeg luav.’ ”
Ob tug thwjtim hov txawm moog ua lawv le Yexu has,
mas caab tug maum neeg luav hab tug mivnyuas lug, hab muab ob tug tej tsho ntev pua sau ob tug neeg luav nraus qaum mas Yexu le caij.
Tej tuabneeg coob coob muab puab tej tsho ntev pua txujkev hab ib txha txav tej ceg ntoo lug pua lawv txujkev.

Cov tuabneeg kws moog ua nwg ntej hab cov kws lawv nwg qaab kuj qw has tas, “Hauxana  rua Tavi tug Tub. Tug kws tuaj huv Yawmsaub lub npe tau nyob kaaj sab lug.” “Hauxana rua sau ntuj kws sab kawg nkaus.”
Thaus Yexu nkaag rua huv Yeluxalee lawm, taag nrho lub nroog suavdawg raag zum quas zawg sws nug tas, “Tug nuav yog leejtwg?”
Tej tuabneeg teb tas, “Yog Yexu kws cev Vaajtswv lug kws tuaj huv lub moos Naxale xeev Kalilai tuaj.”

Yexu txawm moog rua huv Vaajtswv lub tuam tsev mas ntab cov tuabneeg kws ua laag ua luam huv lub tuam tsev tswv, hab nwg muab cov kws pauv nyaj tej rooj hab cov kws muag nquab nyeg tej rooj nyob ntxeev pis hlo tseg.
Nwg has rua puab tas, “Tub muaj lug sau ca has tas, ‘Kuv lub tuam tsev yuav hu tas lub tsev kws thov Vaajtswv,’ tassws mej muab ua qhov rua tub saab nkaum.”
Tuabneeg dig muag hab tuabneeg ceg tawv tuaj cuag Yexu huv lub tuam tsev, mas Yexu khu puab zoo huvsw.
Thaus cov pov thawj hlub hab cov xwbfwb qha Vaajtswv kevcai pum tej num phemfwj kws Yexu ua hab pum cov mivnyuas yau qw huv lub tuam tsev has tas, “Hauxana rua Tavi tug Tub,” mas puab chim heev.

Puab txhad has rua nwg tas, “Koj nov tej kws cov mivnyuas yau qw los tsw nov?” Yexu has rua puab tas, “Nov hab. Mej tsw tau txeev nyeem lov qhov kws has tas, “ ‘Koj tau ua rua tej lug qhuas tawm huv cov mivnyuas yau hab cov mivnyuas kws tsw tau cais mig lub qhov ncauj lug ?’ ”
Yexu tawm huv lub nroog ncaim puab moog su rua huv lub zog Npethani.
Taagkig tom qaab thaus Yexu rov qaab moog rua lub nroog Yeluxalee nwg tshaib plaab.

Nwg pum ib tsob txwv cua ntawm ntug kev. Thaus nwg moog txug tsw pum muaj ib lub txwv le tsuas muaj nplooj xwb. Nwg txawm has rua tsob txwv cua hov tas, “Tsw xob txw txwv dua le lawm lauj!” Taamswm ntawd tsob txwv cua txawm tuag tshaav qhuav lawm.
Thaus cov thwjtim pum le ntawd puab kuj phemfwj has tas, “Ua caag tsob txwv cua yuav tuag tshaav qhuav taamswm?”

Yexu teb puab tas, “Kuv has tseeb rua mej tas, yog mej ntseeg tag hab lub sab tsw ywj faab ywj fwj, tsw yog mej yuav ua tau ib yaam le kuv ua rua tsob txwv cua nuav xwb, mej yuav has rua lub roob nuav tas, ‘Ca le rhu hlo ntaab plawg rua huv havtxwv,’ los yuav muaj le ntawd.
Yog mej ntseeg tag mas mej yeej yuav tau txhua yaam kws mej thov.”

Thaus nwg nkaag moog rua huv lub tuam tsev, cov pov thawj hlub hab cov kev txwj quas laug tuaj cuag nwg rua thaus nwg saamswm qhuab qha hab has tas, “Koj muaj fwjchim daabtsw txhad ua tau tej nuav hab leejtwg muab tug fwjchim nuav rua koj?”
Yexu teb puab tas, “Kuv yuav nug mej ib lus hab. Yog mej teb tau, kuv le qha rua mej tas kuv muaj fwjchim daabtsw txhad ua tau tej nuav.

Txuj kevcai raus dej kws Yauhaa ua hov, lug hovtwg lug? Lug sau ntuj lug los lug ntawm tuabneeg lug?” Puab txawm sablaaj tas, “Yog peb has tas, ‘Lug sau ntuj lug,’ nwg yuav has rua peb tas, ‘Yog le ntawd, ua caag mej tsw ntseeg Yauhaa?’
Yog peb has tas, ‘Lug ntawm tuabneeg lug,’ peb kuj ntshai cov pejxeem, tsua qhov puab suavdawg suav tas Yauhaa yog ib tug xwbfwb cev Vaajtswv lug.”
Puab txawm teb Yexu tas, “Peb tsw paub.” Yexu txhad has rua puab tas, “Kuv kuj tsw qha rua mej tas kuv muaj fwjchim daabtsw txhad ua tau tej nuav.
“Mej xaav le caag? Ib tug yawm muaj ob tug tub. Leej txwv moog has rua thawj tug has tas, ‘Tub 'e, nub nua ca le moog ua num huv lub vaaj txwv maab.’
Tug tub hov teb tas, ‘Kuv tsw moog,’ tassws dhau ntawd nwg ntxeev dua sab mas tsua moog ua lawm.
Leej txwv moog has rua tug tub kws ob has ib yaam nkaus. Tug tub hov teb tas, ‘Txwv, kuv yuav moog,’ tassws tsua tsw moog.

Ob tug tub nuav tug twg ua lawv le leej txwv lub sab?” Puab has tas, “Yog thawj tug.” Yexu has rua puab tas, “Kuv has tseeb rua mej tas, cov tuabneeg sau se hab cov puj muag cev xub nkaag rua huv Vaajtswv lub tebchaws ua mej ntej.

Tsua qhov Yauhaa tub tuaj qha txujkev ncaaj nceeg rua mej, los mej tsw ntseeg nwg, tassws cov kws sau se hab cov puj muag cev tub ntseeg. Txawm yog mej tub pum lawm los mej kuj tsw ntxeev dua sab ntseeg nwg.

“Ca le noog dua ib zaaj pev lug. Muaj ib tug tswv teb cog tau ib vaaj txwv maab hab xov laj kaab hab khawb qhov tsuam kua txwv maab hab ua ib lub tsev zuv, hab muab tso rua ib cov tu faib txwv tes txawm moog lwm tebchaws lawm.
Thaus ze lub caij de txwv, nwg khaiv nwg cov tub qhe moog cuag cov kws tu lub vaaj hov yuav sau tej txwv kws yog nwg le feem.
Cov kws tu lub vaaj txawm muab cov tub qhe hov nteg muab ib tug ntaus, muab ib tug tua pov tseg hab muab pob zeb ntaus dua ib tug.
Mas tug tswv vaaj rov tso dua ib co tub qhe coob dua thawj zag moog, los cov kws tu lub vaaj kuj ua ib yaam nkaus le ntawd rua puab.
Zag kawg nwg tso nwg tug tub moog has tas, ‘Nyab puab yuav fwm kuv tug tub.’
Thaus cov kws tu lub vaaj pum tug tswv tug tub tuaj puab txawm sws has tas, ‘Tug nuav yog tug kws saws nwg qub txeeg qub teg. Peb ca le muab nwg tua hab txeeb hlo nwg qub txeeg qub teg.’
Puab txawm muab nwg nteg nrum rua nrau ntug vaaj hab muab nwg tua pov tseg.
Yog le nuav thaus tug tswv vaaj lug, nwg yuav ua le caag rua cov kws tu lub vaaj ntawd?”
Puab has rua Yexu tas, “Nwg yuav muab cov tuabneeg phem hov tua kuas puam tsuaj taag hab yuav muab lub vaaj txwv maab rua lwm cov tu kws yuav faib tej txwv rua nwg lawv le lub caij.”

Yexu has rua puab tas, “Mej tsw tau nyeem huv Vaajtswv phoo ntawv lov? Qhov kws has tas, “ ‘Lub pob zeb kws cov Kws ua tsev muab xyeeb tseg lawm tub muab lug teeb ua lub thawj rua ntawm kaum tsev lawm. Tej nuav yog tug Tswv ua, yog yaam phemfwj kws peb qhov muag pum.’
“Vem le nuav kuv has rua mej tas, Vaajtswv lub tebchaws yuav raug muab rhu ntawm mej moog pub rua ib haiv tuabneeg kws txw txwv phim lub tebchaws hov.
[Leejtwg qaug moog tsam lub pob zeb nuav tug hov yuav tawg ua tej dwb daim, lub pob zeb poob lug tsuam leejtwg tug hov yuav ntsoog taag.]”
Thaus cov pov thawj hlub hab cov Falixai nov zaaj paaj lug nuav, puab kuj paub tas Yexu has raug puab.
Puab nrhav kev nteg Yexu, tassws puab ntshai cov pejxeem, tsua qhov cov pejxeem ntseeg tas Yexu yog ib tug xwbfwb cev Vaajtswv lug.
Yexu has dua pev lug rua puab tas,
“Ntuj Ceeb Tsheej pev ib yaam le ib tug vaajntxwv kws npaaj rooj tshoob rua nwg tug tub,
mas khaiv nwg cov qhev moog hu cov qhua kws caw tuaj noj tshoob, tassws puab tsw kaam tuaj.

Nwg rov khaiv dua ib co tub qhe moog has tas, ‘Ca le has rua cov kws tub caw hov tas, Kuv tub npaaj nqaj qhau hab kuv tub tua tej nyuj hab tej mivnyuas nyuj kws fwb tav taag lawm, txhua yaam tub npaaj txhwj lawm. Mej ca le tuaj noj tshoob lauj!’
Tassws puab tsw quav ntsej le, ib tug moog ua laj ua teb, ib tug moog ua laag ua luam,
dua le cov tseed ua phem rua nwg cov qhev hab muab tua pov tseg.
Vaajntxwv npau tawg heev nwg txhad tso nwg cov tub rog moog ua kuas cov kws tua tuabneeg hov puam tsuaj hab muab puab lub moos hlawv pov tseg.
Nwg has rua nwg cov tub qhe tas, ‘Rooj tshoob npaaj txhwj lawm, tassws cov kws caw hov tsw tswm nyog tuaj noj.
Vem le nuav ca le tawm moog tom tej kev tshuam ntswb leejtwg kuj hu tuaj noj tshoob.’
Cov tub qhe hov txhad tawm moog tom tej kev hab hu txhua tug kws puab ntswb tsw has tug zoo tug phem, txhad muaj qhua puv nkaus chaav tsev ua tshoob.
“Thaus tug vaajntxwv hov lug saib cov qhua, nwg pum ib tug tsw naav tsoog tsho ua tshoob,
tes txawm has rua tug hov tas, ‘Kwvluag 'e, ua caag koj tuaj ntawm nuav tsw naav tsoog tsho ua tshoob?’ Tug hov has tsw taug ib lus le.
Vaajntxwv has rua cov tub qhe tas, ‘Ca le muab tug nuav khi teg khi taw laim rua saab nrau kws tsaus ntuj nti, qhov ntawd yuav muaj kev quaj qes nav quas qawv.’
Cov kws caw hu muaj coob, kuas cov kws xaiv tau muaj tsawg.”
Thaus ntawd cov Falixai moog sablaaj saib yuav nyaag Yexu tej lug le caag.

Puab txawm khaiv puab cov thwjtim hab Helauj cov moog thom Yexu has tas, “Xwbfwb, peb paub tas koj yog ib tug ncaaj nceeg hab koj qha Vaajtswv txuj kev lawv le muaj tseeb hab tsw ua lawv le leejtwg lub sab nyam tsua qhov koj tsw saib leejtwg ntsej muag.
Yog le nuav, thov koj qha rua peb saib koj xaav le caag. Tswm nyog them se rua Xixa los tsw them?”
Yexu paub qhov kws puab xaav phem, nwg txhad has tas, “Cov nam tuabneeg ncauj lug zoo sab phem, mej tuaj swm kuv ua daabtsw?
Ca le muab lub nyaj them se hov rua kuv saib.” Puab txhad muab ib lub ntenalia rua nwg.
Yexu has rua puab tas, “Lub ntsej muag hab lub npe kws txaug nuav yog leejtwg?”
Puab teb tas, “Yog Xixa le.” Yexu txawm has rua puab tas, “Yog le nuav yaam kws yog Xixa le ca le muab rua Xixa, yaam kws yog Vaajtswv le ca le muab rua Vaajtswv.”
Thaus puab nov tej lug hov puab xaav tsw thoob, puab txawm ncaim Yexu moog lawm.
Tuab nub ntawd cov Xantukai kws qha has tas tsw muaj qhov kws sawv huv qhov tuag lug txawm tuaj cuag Yexu. Puab txhad thom Yexu
has tas, “Xwbfwb, Mauxe tub has tas, ‘Yog leejtwg tuag lawm tsw tau muaj mivnyuas, mas nwg ib tug kwvtij yuav tsum yuav tug puj ntsuag hov txhad rhawv tau tug kws tuag le keeb kwm ca.’
Peb cov muaj xyaa tug kwvtij. Tug hlub muaj quaspuj lawm le tuag tsw tau muaj mivnyuas, tseg tug quaspuj rua tug kwv yuav ua quaspuj.
Mas tug ob tug peb moog txug tug xyaa kuj tuag taag ib yaam nkaus.
Thaus kawg tug quaspuj hov kuj tuag lawm.
Vem le nuav nub kws caj sawv rov lug, tug quaspuj hov yuav ua xyaa leej hov tug twg le quaspuj, tsua qhov nwg tub ua xyaa leej hov le quaspuj lawm?”
Yexu teb puab tas, “Mej yuam kev lawm, mej tsw paub Vaajtswv txujlug hab tsw paub Vaajtswv tug fwjchim.
Thaus tuabneeg caj sawv rov lug hov, tsw muaj kev sws yuav ua quaspuj quasyawg lawm, yuav zoo ib yaam le cov tubkhai ntuj xwb.
Has txug qhov kws sawv huv qhov tuag rov lug, mej tsw tau nyeem tej kws Vaajtswv has rua mej lov? Nwg has tas,
‘Kuv yog Aplahaa tug Vaajtswv, yog Yiha tug Vaajtswv hab yog Yakhauj tug Vaajtswv.’  Vaajtswv tsw yog cov tuabneeg tuag tug Vaajtswv, nwg yog cov tuabneeg caj tug Vaajtswv.”
Thaus cov tuabneeg hov nov, puab kuj phemfwj rua Yexu tej lug qhuab qha.
Thaus cov Falixai nov tas Yexu ua rua cov Xantukai twg kev tsw muaj lug has lawm, puab txawm sau zog ua ke,
mas ib tug xwbfwb kws paub cai txawm swm nug Yexu has tas,
“Xwbfwb, txuj kevcai nqai twg tseem ceeb dua ndais?”
Yexu has rua nwg tas, “ ‘Koj yuav tsum hlub tug Tswv kws yog koj tug Vaajtswv kawg sab kawg ntsws, hab kawg koj tug tswvyim.’
Nqai nuav yog thawj nqais hab yog nqai kws tseem ceeb dua ndais.
Nqai kws ob kuj ib yaam nkaus has tas, ‘Koj yuav tsum hlub kwvtij zej zog ib yaam le koj hlub koj tug kheej.’
Mauxe txuj kevcai hab cov xwbfwb cev lug tej lug qha huvsw nyob taag nrho rua huv ob nqais nuav.”
Thaus cov Falixai tseed nyob ua ke ntawd, Yexu txawm nug puab
has tas, “Mej xaav le caag txug tug Kheto? Nwg yog leejtwg le tub?” Puab has rua nwg tas, “Yog Tavi le tub.”
Yexu txhad nug puab tas, “Yog le ntawd ua caag Vaaj Ntsuj Plig kuas Tavi hu tug Kheto tas ‘tug Tswv’? hab has tas,
“ ‘Tug Tswv has rua kuv tug tswv tas, “Ca le nyob tsawg ntawm kuv saab xws, moog txug thaus kuv muab koj cov yeeb ncuab tag koj xwb taw.” ’
Yog Tavi tub hu tug Kheto tas ‘tug Tswv,’ nwg yuav ua le caag ua tau Tavi le tub?”
Tsw muaj ib tug twg teb tau Yexu ib lus le. Txwj nub ntawd lug tsw muaj leejtwg muaj cuabkaav nug Yexu dua le lawm.
Thaus ntawd Yexu has rua cov tuabneeg hov hab nwg cov thwjtim tas,
“Cov xwbfwb qha Vaajtswv kevcai hab cov Falixai nyob Mauxe chaw qha.
Yog le ntawd txhua yaam kws puab qha rua mej mas mej yuav tsum ua hab tuav rawv, tsuas yog tseg tsw ua lawv nraim le puab ua, tsua qhov puab tsuas yog qha xwb, puab tsw ua lawv le puab qha.
Puab muab lub nraa nyaav [kws ceblaaj rws]  nog rua tuabneeg rws sau xubpwg tassws puab tub tsw kaam xuas puab tug ntiv teg thab hlo le.
Txhua yaam kws puab ua puab ua rua tuabneeg qhuas puab xwb. Puab muab lub naab luj ntim Vaajtswv txujlug khi rua ntawm hauv plaj hab ntxhoo tw ntev rua puab tej qaab tsho,
hab thaus muaj rooj noj rooj haus puab nyam nyob saam tsum, hab nyob tej rooj sab huv tej tsev sablaaj,
puab nyam kuas luas fwm puab tom tej tshaav puam, hab nyam kuas luas hu puab tas, ‘Lanpi.’
Mej tsw xob ca leejtwg hu mej tas ‘Lanpi,’ vem mej muaj tuab tug ua xwbfwb qha mej xwb, hab mej suavdawg yog kwvtij.
Tsw xob hu leejtwg huv nplajteb tas yog mej leej txwv, tsua qhov mej muaj tuab leej Txwv kws nyob sau ntuj.
Tsw xob ca leejtwg hu mej tas, ‘Kws xwbfwb,’ tsua qhov mej muaj tuab tug Kws xwbfwb kws yog tug Kheto.
Mej cov tug kws ua hlub nwg yuav tsum ua mej le qhev.
Leejtwg tsaab ua luj yuav raug muab txu kuas qeg. Leejtwg txu fwjchim tug hov yuav raug muab tsaa ua luj.

“Mej cov xwbfwb qha Vaajtswv kevcai hab cov Falixai kws ncauj lug zoo sab phem, mej yuav raug txom nyem lauj! Mej kaw qhov rooj ntuj ceeb tsheej tsw kheev tuabneeg nkaag moog. Mej cov los kuj tsw moog rua huv, hab mej tseed txwv cov kws yuav moog rua huv hab.

“Mej cov xwbfwb qha Vaajtswv kevcai hab cov Falixai kws ncauj lug zoo sab phem, mej yuav raug txom nyem lauj! Mej hlaa havtxwv hlaa nruab nqhuab moog sub txhad coj tau ib tug twg lug ntseeg mej kevcai, tassws thaus nwg ntseeg lawd mej tseed ua rua nwg rov ua ntuj tawg kub le mivnyuas heev dua mej ob npaug.

“Mej cov nam tuabneeg dig muag kws coj luas kev, mej yuav raug txom nyem lauj! Mej has tas, ‘Yog leejtwg tuav lub tuam tsev cog lug twv, mas tej lug hov tsw yom ceev, tassws yog tuav tej kub huv lub tuam tsev cog lug twv, mas nwg yuav tsum ua lawv le tej lug twv hov.’
Cov nam tuabneeg ruag dig muag, yaam twg tseem ceeb dua, yog tej kub lossws lub tuam tsev kws ua rua tej kub hov dawb huv?

Hab mej has tas, ‘Leejtwg tuav lub thaaj xyeem cog lug twv mas tej lug hov tsw yom ceev, tassws yog leejtwg tuav tej kws muab xyeem rua sau lub thaaj hov twv, mas nwg yuav tsum ua lawv le tej lug kws twv hov.’
Cov nam tuabneeg dig muag, yaam twg tseem ceeb dua, yog tej kws muab xyeem lossws lub thaaj kws ua rua tej kws xyeem hov dawb huv?
Yog le nuav tug kws tuav lub thaaj cog lug twv kuj yog nwg tuav lub thaaj hab txhua yaam kws nyob sau lub thaaj hov,
hab tug kws tuav lub tuam tsev cog lug twv kuj yog tuav lub tuam tsev hab tug Vaajtswv kws nyob huv lub tuam tsev hov,
hab tug kws tuav ntuj ceeb tsheej cog lug twv kuj yog tuav Vaajtswv lub zwm txwv hab Vaajtswv kws nyob tsawg sau lub zwm txwv hov twv.

“Mej cov xwbfwb qha Vaajtswv kevcai hab cov Falixai kws ncauj lug zoo sab phem, mej yuav raug txom nyem lauj! Mej muab ib feem kaum puam hum, xyaab txob hab qhav daaj xyeem, tassws tej nqais tseem ceeb dua huv Vaajtswv txuj kevcai kws yog tu plaub ncaaj hab kev khuvleej hab qhov kws xwb rua Vaajtswv mej ho muab tso tseg lawm. Tej kws has taag nuav mej yuav tsum ua, hab tsw xob tso lwm txuj tseg.
Mej cov nam tuabneeg dig muag kws coj luas kev, mej lim ib tug nyuas yoov tseg tassws mej nqog hlo tug nam ntxhuav lawm.

“Mej cov xwbfwb qha Vaajtswv kevcai hab cov Falixai kws ncauj lug zoo sab phem, mej yuav raug txom nyem lauj! Mej ntxuav khob ntxuav taig saab nrau, tassws saab huv mej puv nkaus qhov kws ua sab hlub hab qaug sab rua yaam u yaam nuav.
Cov Falixai dig muag 'e, ca le ntxuav khob saab huv ua ntej, saab nrau txhad le huv hab.

“Mej cov xwbfwb qha Vaajtswv kevcai hab mej cov Falixai kws ncauj lug zoo sab phem, mej yuav raug txom nyem lauj! Mej zoo yaam nkaus le lub ntxaa kws luam moov swb dawb paug, saib saab nrau mas zoo nkauj tassws saab huv puv nkaus pob txhaa tuabneeg tuag hab txhua yaam kev phem kev qas.
Ib yaam le ntawd saib saab nrau mas mej yog tuabneeg ncaaj nceeg, tassws saab huv yog tuabneeg ncauj lug zoo sab phem hab puv nkaus kev txhum txem.

“Mej cov xwbfwb qha Vaajtswv kevcai hab cov Falixai kws ncauj lug zoo sab phem, mej yuav raug txom nyem lauj! Mej txhwm cov xwbfwb cev Vaajtswv lug tej ntxaa hab khu tej chaw kws ncu txug cov tuabneeg ncaaj nceeg thau u kuas zoo nkauj,
hab mej has tas, ‘Yog peb nyob rua lub swjhawm kws peb tej laug hov nyob, peb yuav tsw nrug puab tua tej xwbfwb kws cev Vaajtswv lug ntawd.’
Mej has le ntawd kuj yog mej ua timkhawv rov tum mej has tas mej yog cov kws tua tej xwbfwb cev lug hov le tub ki.
Mej ca le tsaav tej kev txhum kws mej tej laug tau ua kuas puv nkaus.
Cov nam naab 'e, cov nam noob naab phem 'e, mej yuav dim lub txem kws yuav poob ntuj tawg kub tau le caag?

Vem le nuav kuv txhad tso cov xwbfwb cev lug hab cov tuabneeg txawj ntse hab cov xwbfwb qha Vaajtswv kevcai tuaj cuag mej, los mej yuav muab ib txha tua hab muab teem rua sau khaublig ntoo hab muab nplawm huv mej tej tsev sablaaj, hab muab ntab tawm ib lub moos dhau ib lub moos.

Yog le ntawd cov tuabneeg ncaaj nceeg txhua tug tej ntshaav kws lug rua huv lub nplajteb txwj thaus Anpee kws yog tug ncaaj nceeg cov ntshaav moog txug Xekhaliya kws yog Npalakhiya tug tub cov ntshaav kws mej tua ntawm lub tuam tsev hab lub thaaj kem nruab nraab, yuav poob rua sau mej.
Kuv has tseeb rua mej tas, tej txem hov huvsw yuav poob rua tam tuabneeg nuav.

“Au Yeluxalee, Yeluxalee 'e, koj yog tug kws tua cov xwbfwb cev Vaajtswv lug hab xuas pob zeb ntaus cov kws khaiv tuaj cuag koj tuag. Muaj ntau zag kuv tub xaav qaws koj cov mivnyuas lug ua ke ib yaam le tug puj qab puag nwg cov mivnyuas rua huv nwg phob tis, tassws mej tsw yeem hlo le.
Saib nawj mej lub tuam tsev yuav raug muab tso tseg nyob do cuas.
Kuv has rua mej tas txwj nuav moog mej yuav tsw rov pum kuv dua moog txug thaus mej has tas, ‘Tug kws tuaj huv tug Tswv lub npe tau nyob kaaj sab lug.’ ”
Thaus Yexu tawm ntawm lub tuam tsev moog, nwg cov thwjtim txawm lug taw teg rua tej tsev huv lub loog tuam tsev rua Yexu saib.
Yexu txawm has rua puab tas, “Mej pum tej nuav huvsw lov? Kuv has tseeb rua mej tas tej txhwb zeb kws tib ib lub tshooj ib lub nuav yuav tsw tshuav ib lub kws tsw raug muab ua pob taag.”

Thaus Yexu nyob tsawg sau roob Txwv Aulib, cov thwjtim txawm lug cuag nwg tuabywv has tas, “Thov qha peb paub tas tej xwm txheej nuav yuav tshwm lug thaus twg, hab muaj yaam txujci twg qha kuas paub tas koj yuav tshwm plawg lug hab lub caij lub nyoog yuav kawg?”
Yexu txhad teb puab tas, “Ca le ceev faaj tuab zoo tsw xob ca leejtwg ntxag mej yuam kev.
Tsua qhov yuav muaj ntau leej tuav kuv lub npe lug has tas, ‘Kuv yog tug Kheto,’ mas puab yuav ua rua tuabneeg coob coob yuam kev.
Mej yuav nov suab ua tsuv ua rog hab nov moo ua rog. Ca le ceev faaj tsw xob poob sab hlo le, tsua qhov tej nuav yeej yuav tsum tshwm lug tassws tsw tau txug thaus kawg.
Ib lub tebchaws yuav sawv tawm tsaam rua ib lub tebchaws, ib tug vaajntxwv yuav tawm tsaam rua ib tug vaajntxwv, yuav muaj kev tshaib nqhes hab ntuj qeg ntau qhov.
Tej xwm txheej nuav huvsw yog chiv ua mob teb xwb.
“Lub swjhawm ntawd luas yuav muab mej cob rua kev tswm txom hab muab mej tua pov tseg. Ib tsoom tebchaws suavdawg yuav ntxub mej vem yog tim kuv lub npe.
Thaus ntawd ntau leej yuav thim hab ib leeg faav xeeb rua ib leeg hab ib leeg ntxub ib leeg.
Yuav muaj ntau tug cuav xwbfwb cev lug tshwm tuaj ua rua tuabneeg coob coob yuam kev.
Vem kev phem nthuav daav zuj zug, tej tuabneeg coob coob txujkev hlub yuav txag quas zug moog.
Tassws tug kws thev taug txug thaus kawg yuav dim.
Txuj xuv zoo kws has txug Vaajtswv lub tebchaws yuav raug muab tshaaj tawm thoob plawg lub nplajteb ua timkhawv rua ib tsoom tebchaws, mas thaus ntawd lub swjhawm kawg yuav lug txug.
“Thaus mej pum yaam kws qas vuab tsuab kws ua kuas lamswm taag txawb ca rua huv lub chaw dawb huv lawv le xwbfwb Taniyee kws cev Vaajtswv lug tau qha tseg lawd  (ca tug kws nyeem nkaag sab nawj),
mas thaus hov cov kws nyob huv Yutia ca le tswv moog rua peg tej roob,
tug kws nyob sau txheej tsev laag tshaav tsw xob nqeg muab nwg tej hov txhua chaw huv tsev,
hab tug kws nyob tom teb tsw xob rov lug muab nwg lub tsho ntev.
“Nub ntawd cov kws suab mivnyuas hab cov kws muaj mivnyuas noj mig yuav txom nyem kawg le lauj!
Ca le thov kuas mej tsw xob tau tswv rua lub caij ntuj no lossws nub Xanpatau.
Vem tas lub swjhawm ntawd yuav muaj kev ceblaaj txom nyem luj kawg le, txwj thaus tswm ntuj tswm teb lug txug naj nub nwgnuav tsw tau muaj dua le ntawd hab dhau ntawd moog yuav tsw muaj dua le lawm.
Yog tsw muab lub caij lub nyoog hov txav kuas tuab lu, yuav tsw muaj tuabneeg dim tau le. Tassws vem saib rua cov kws tub xaiv ca lawd, txhad muab lub caij lub nyoog txav kuas tuab lu.
“Thaus ntawd yog leejtwg has rua mej tas, ‘Saib maj, tug Kheto nyob ntawm nuav,’ lossws has tas, ‘Nwg nyob tim u,’ mej tsw xob ntseeg.

Tsua qhov tas yuav muaj cov cuav Kheto hab cov cuav xwbfwb cev lug sawv lug ua txujci tseem ceeb hab txujci phemfwj kws luj kawg, mas yog ua tau, tej txujci hov yuav ntxag cov kws tub xaiv ca lawd kuas yuam kev.
Saib nawj, kuv tub has rua mej ua ntej lawm.
Yog le nuav yog puab has rua mej tas, ‘Saib maj, nwg nyob huv tebchaws moj saab qhua,’ tsw xob tawm moog saib. Yog puab has tas, ‘Nwg nyob huv txaaj,’ kuj tsw xob ntseeg.
Tsag lig xub tawm saab nub tuaj ci moog rua saab nub poob le caag, qhov kws Tuabneeg leej Tub tshwm plawg lug yuav zoo ib yaam le ntawd.
Tsaj tuag hovtwg, daav noj twm yuav sau nthwv lug rua hov ntawd.

“Thaus dhau tej kev ceblaaj txom nyem ntawd lawm, “ ‘lub nub yuav tsaus moog, lub hli yuav tsw ci, tej nub qub yuav poob sau ntuj lug, tej kws muaj fwjchim sau nruab ntug yuav raug muab cu ua zug quas kais.’

Thaus ntawd yaam txujci kws qha txug Tuabneeg leej Tub, yuav tshwm rua sau nruab ntug. Txhua haiv tuabneeg huv qaab ntuj yuav ntaus hauv sab quaj ntsuag, hab puab yuav pum Tuabneeg leej Tub nrug nwg tug fwjchim hab meej mom luj nrug fuab sau ntuj lug.

Nwg yuav khaiv nwg cov tubkhai ntuj nrug suab raaj suab xyu nrov heev lug, mas puab yuav qaws cov tuabneeg kws nwg xaiv ca lawd taag nrho plaub ceg kaum ntuj txwj saab ntuj nuav moog thoob plawg saab ntuj tim u huvsw.
“Ca le kawm tej pev lug ntawm tsob ntoo cua. Thaus tej ceg mog nyoos hab chiv hlaav nplooj, mej kuj paub tas yuav txug lub caij ntuj kub.
Ib yaam le ntawd, thaus mej pum tej xwm txheej nuav huvsw mej kuj paub tas nwg tub lug ze ntawm qhov rooj lawm.
Kuv has tseeb rua mej tas, tam tuabneeg nuav yuav tsw tau dua taag moog txug thaus txhua yaam nuav tshwm lug lawm.
Lub ntuj hab lub nplajteb yuav dua moog, tassws kuv tej lug yuav tsw pluj hlo le.
“Tassws nub ntawd hab teev ntawd tsw muaj leejtwg paub, txawm yog cov tubkhai ntuj hab leej Tub kuj tsw paub tsuas yog leej Txwv tuab leeg paub xwb.
Tam kws Nau‑a nyob zoo le caag, tes thaus Tuabneeg leej Tub tshwm plawg lug kuj yuav zoo ib yaam le ntawd.
Tsua qhov ua ntej kws dej tsw tau nyaab, tej tuabneeg noj haus ua tshoob qua tub qua ntxhais moog txug nub kws Nau‑a nkaag rua huv lub nkoj,
mas puab tub tsw paub moog txug thaus dej lug nyaab hlo puab hab kuav taag nrho huvsw. Thaus Tuabneeg leej Tub tshwm plawg lug yuav zoo ib yaam le ntawd.
Thaus ntawd muaj ob tug txwvneej nyob tom teb, los yuav coj ib tug moog yuav tseg ib tug ca.
Muaj ob tug quaspuj zum zeb huv lub tsev zeb, los yuav coj ib tug moog yuav tseg ib tug ca.
Vem le nuav mej yuav tsum ceev faaj zuv tog, tsua qhov mej tsw paub tas mej tug Tswv yuav lug rua nub twg.
Ca le paub tas, yog tug tswv tsev xub paub tas tub saab yuav tuaj mo ntuj thaus twg, nwg yuav zuv tog tsw kheev kuas tho tau nwg lub tsev.
Yog le nuav mej yuav tsum npaaj txhwj tsua qhov Tuabneeg leej Tub yuav lug rua teev kws mej tsw ncu xaav txug.
“Leejtwg yog tug qhev ncaaj hab ntse kws tug lospaav tsaa saib cov tub qhe hab faib mov rua puab noj lawv swjhawm?
Thaus tug lospaav lug pum nwg tseed ua num le hov, tug qhev hov yuav tau nyob kaaj sab lug.
Kuv has tseeb rua mej tas, tug lospaav yuav tsaa nwg ua tug saib taag nrho lospaav tej cuab txhaj cuab taam huvsw.
Tassws yog tug qhev hov phem hab xaav has tas, ‘Kuv tug lospaav lug qeeb,’
tes nwg txawm chiv muab nwg paab tub qhe ntaus hab moog nrug cov qaug cawv noj haus ua ke,
mas nwg tug lospaav yuav lug rua nub kws nwg tsw ncu xaav txug hab teev kws nwg tsw paub,
mas tug lospaav yuav muab nwg tsuav ua tej dwb daim hab tu chaw rua nwg nrug cov tuabneeg ncauj lug zoo sab phem nyob, yog lub chaw kws muaj kev quaj qes nav quas qawv.”
“Thaus txug nub ntawd Ntuj Ceeb Tsheej yuav pev zoo ib yaam le kaum tug hluas nkauj nqaa teeb moog tog tug nraug vauv.
Muaj tswb tug ruag muaj tswb tug ntse.
Cov kws ruag nqaa teeb kuas tsw nqaa roj moog.
Cov kws ntse coj teeb hab coj fwj roj moog.
Tug nraug vauv tuaj lig lig tes puab txawm ncaws daab ndub tsaug zug lawm.
“Thaus ib taag mo, muaj suab hu has tas, ‘Tug nraug vauv tuaj lawm lauj! Ca le tawm moog tog nwg.’
Cov hluas nkauj hov suavdawg txawm sawv tseeg lug khu puab tej teeb xeeb.
Cov kws ruag has rua cov kws ntse tas, ‘Thov faib mej le roj rua peb hab, vem peb tej teeb tub yuav tuag.’
Cov kws ntse teb tas, ‘Ntshai tsaam roj tsw txaus rua peb hab mej. Mej ca le moog yuav roj ntawm cov kws muag roj rua mej.’
Thaus puab cov tawm moog yuav roj lawd, tug nraug vauv txawm tuaj txug, mas cov kws npaaj txhwj lawd kuj tau nrug nwg moog rua huv rooj tshoob, tes lub qhov rooj txawm raug muab kaw lawm.
Dhau ntawd tswb tug hluas nkauj ruag hov txawm lug mas has tas, ‘Yawm hlub, yawm hlub, thov qheb qhov rooj rua peb.’
Tug nraug vauv teb tas, ‘Kuv has tseeb rua mej tas, kuv tsw paub mej.’
Vem le nuav mej yuav tsum zuv tog, tsua qhov mej tsw paub tas yog nub twg hab yog teev twg.
“Nub ntawd pev ib yaam le ib tug yawm kws yuav moog kev deb, nwg txawm hu nwg cov tub qhe lug cuag nwg hab muab nwg tej cuab txhaj cuab taam rua puab saib.
Nwg muab tswb talaa rua ib tug, muab ob talaa rua ib tug hab ib talaa  rua dua ib tug, muab rua txhua tug lawv le nyag tug peevxwm, tes nwg txawm moog lawm.
Tug kws tau tswb talaa txawm coj cov nyaj hov moog ua laag ua luam taamswm mas tau tshaaj thawj tswb talaa.
Ib yaam nkaus tug kws tau ob talaa kuj tau tshaaj thawj ob talaa hab.
Tassws tug kws tau ib talaa txawm moog khawb qhov muab nwg tug lospaav le nyaj zais ca.
“Dhau ntev loo, cov tub qhe hov tug lospaav txawm rov lug tshuaj saib tej nyaj txag hov puab swv le caag.
Tug kws tau tswb talaa txaav lug hab coj tswb talaa kws yog tshaaj thawj lug has tas, ‘Yawm hlub, koj muab tswb talaa cob rua kuv. Saib maj, kuv tau tshaaj thawj tswb talaa hab.’

Tug lospaav has rua nwg tas, ‘Tug tub qhe zoo hab ncaaj nceeg, koj ua zoo lawm. Koj ua ncaaj rua tej yaam tsawg tsawg, kuv yuav tsaa koj saib tej yaam kws ntau heev. Koj ca le lug nrug kuv zoo sab xyiv faab.’
Tug kws tau ob talaa kuj txaav lug hab has tas, ‘Yawm hlub, koj muab ob talaa cob rua kuv. Saib maj, kuv tau tshaaj thawj ob talaa hab.’

Tug lospaav has rua nwg tas, ‘Tug tub qhe zoo hab ncaaj nceeg, koj ua zoo lawm. Koj ua ncaaj rua tej yaam tsawg tsawg, kuv yuav tsaa koj saib tej yaam kws ntau heev. Koj ca le lug nrug kuv zoo sab xyiv faab.’
Tug kws tau ib talaa kuj txaav lug hab has tas, ‘Yawm hlub, kuv yeej paub tas koj yog ib tug tuabneeg tswv tsaim, koj hlais tej qoob kws koj tsw tau cog hab sau tej kws koj tsw tau tseb.
Kuv ntshai kuv txhad muab koj talaa nyaj zais rua huv aav lawm. Saib maj, koj talaa nyaj nyob nuav.’
Tug lospaav txawm teb nwg tas, ‘Nam tub qhe phem hab cis nkeeg, koj paub tas kuv hlais tej kws kuv tsw tau cog hab sau tej kws kuv tsw tau tseb lov?
Yog le hov, tswm nyog koj coj kuv cov nyaj moog tso rua huv tsev ca nyaj, es thaus kuv rov lug kuv txhad tau kuv cov nyaj hab tau cov paaj.
Yog le nuav ca le muab nwg ib talaa nyaj hov rhu moog rua tug kws muaj kaum talaa.
Tsua qhov txhua tug kws muaj lawd yuav muab tsaav kuas muaj ntau nplua mag, tassws tug kws tsw muaj, txawm yog tej kws nwg muaj los yuav muab rhu ntawm nwg moog.
Ca le muab tug tub qhe tsw tswm txaj hov laim tawm moog rua saab nrau kws tsaus ntuj nti, qhov ntawd yuav muaj kev quaj qes nav quas qawv.’
“Thaus Tuabneeg leej Tub nrug nwg tug fwjchim ci ntsaa ab hab cov tubkhai ntuj suavdawg nqeg lug, thaus hov nwg yuav nyob tsawg sau nwg lub zwm txwv kws muaj fwjchim ci ntsaa ab.
Ib tsoom tebchaws suavdawg yuav raug sau zog tuaj ua ke rua ntawm nwg xubndag, mas nwg yuav muab puab cais ua ob paab ib yaam le tug yug yaaj cais cov yaaj tawm ntawm cov tshws.
Nwg yuav muab cov yaaj tso nyob rua ntawm nwg saab xws, muab cov tshws tso nyob rua ntawm nwg saab phem.

Thaus ntawd vaajntxwv yuav has rua cov kws nyob ntawm nwg saab xws tas, ‘Mej cov kws tau koob moov ntawm kuv leej Txwv ca le lug txais lub tebchaws kws tub npaaj tseg rua mej txwj thaus tswm lub nplajteb lug lawm ua mej tug.
Vem thaus kuv tshaib mej pub rua kuv noj, thaus kuv nqhes dej mej pub kuv haus, thaus kuv ua qhua txawv ntsej muag mej hu kuv lug tsev,
thaus kuv lab qaab mej muab rua kuv naav, thaus kuv muaj mob mej tuaj saib kuv, thaus kuv raug kaw huv tsev lojfaaj mej tuaj saib kuv.’
“Mas cov tuabneeg ncaaj nceeg yuav teb nwg tas, ‘Tug Tswv, thaus twg peb pum koj tshaib es tau muab rua koj noj, lossws pum koj nqhes es muab rua koj haus?
Thaus twg peb pum koj ua qhua txawv ntsej muag es tau hu koj lug tsev, lossws pum koj lab qaab es muab rua koj naav?
Thaus twg peb pum koj muaj mob lossws raug kaw es tuaj saib koj?’
Vaajntxwv yuav teb puab tas, ‘Kuv has tseeb rua mej tas, qhov kws mej tau ua rua kuv cov kwvtij nuav ib tug twg kws miv dhau, kuj yog ua rua kuv lawm.’

“Mas nwg yuav has rua cov kws nyob ntawm nwg saab phem tas, ‘Mej cov kws raug tsawm foom, ca le tswv ntawm kuv moog rua huv cub tawg kws kub ib txhws kws npaaj tseg ca rua daab Ntxwg Nyoog hab nwg cov tubkhai lawm.
Tsua qhov thaus kuv tshaib mej tsw pub rua kuv noj, thaus kuv nqhes dej mej tsw pub kuv haus,
thaus kuv ua qhua txawv ntsej muag mej tsw hu kuv lug tsev, thaus kuv lab qaab mej tsw muab rua kuv naav, thaus kuv muaj mob hab raug kaw huv tsev lojfaaj mej tsw tuaj saib kuv.’
Mas puab yuav teb nwg tas, ‘Tug Tswv, thaus twg peb pum koj tshaib lossws nqhes dej lossws ua qhua txawv ntsej muag lossws lab qaab lossws mob lossws raug kaw, es tsw ua koom rua koj?’
Nwg yuav teb puab tas, ‘Kuv has tseeb rua mej tas, qhov kws mej tsw tau ua rua cov nuav ib tug twg kws miv dhau, kuj yog tsw ua rua kuv lawm.’
Mas puab yuav tawm moog raug teem txem ib txhws tsw kawg, tassws cov ncaaj nceeg yuav tau txujsa ntev moog ib txhws tsw kawg.”
Thaus Yexu has tej lug nuav huvsw taag lawm nwg txawm has rua nwg cov thwjtim tas,
“Mej yeej paub lawm tas tshuav ob nub xwb tes txug lub caij ua kevcai Hlaa Dhau, mas Tuabneeg leej Tub yuav raug muab cob rua luas teem rua sau khaublig ntoo.”
Thaus ntawd cov pov thawj hlub hab cov kev txwj quas laug tuaj ua ke rua huv tug tuam pov thawj hlub Khayafa lub tsev,
hab puab sablaaj tuav huv yuav nteg Yexu tuabywv hab muab nwg tua pov tseg.
Puab has tas, “Tsw xob nteg nwg rua lub swjhawm kws ua kevcai nuav tsaam tes muaj kev kub ntxhuv rua huv cov pejxeem.”
Thaus Yexu nyob huv Ximoo kws mob ruas lub tsev huv lub zog Npethani,
Yexu tseed pheeb ntawm rooj mov, txawm muaj ib tug puj nqaa ib fwj  roj tsw qaab muaj nqes heev tuaj cuag Yexu tes txawm muab laub rua sau Yexu taubhau.
Thaus cov thwjtim pum le hov puab chim txawm has tas, “Ua caag yuav nkim tej roj nuav?
Cov roj nuav yog muab muag tau nyaj ntau coj moog pub rua cov tuabneeg pluag kuj tau.”
Yexu kuj paub tes nwg txawm has rua puab tas, “Mej ua rua tug puj nuav ntxhuv sab ua daabtsw? Nwg ua yaam kws zoo heev rua kuv.
Yeej yuav muaj cov tuabneeg pluag nrug mej nyob moog le, tassws mej yuav tsw muaj kuv nrug mej nyob moog le.
Qhov kws nwg laub roj rua sau kuv lub cev tub yog nwg tu kuv lub cev ca rua nub kws log kuv.
Kuv has tseeb rua mej tas, tshaaj tawm txuj xuv zoo nuav tawm moog thoob nplajteb txug hovtwg, qhov kws tug puj nuav ua yuav nrov nchaa moog txug hov ntawd ua lub chaw ncu txug nwg.”
Thaus ntawd kaum ob tug thwjtim tug kws npe hu ua Yutas Ikhali‑au txawm moog cuag cov pov thawj hlub,
hab has tas, “Yog kuv muab Yexu cob rua mej, mej yuav muab daabtsw rua kuv?” Puab txawm suav peb caug lub nyaj rua nwg.
Txwj thaus hov lug Yutas nrhav swjhawm yuav muab Yexu cob rua puab.
Thawj nub kws ua kevcai Noj Ncuav tsw Xyaw Keeb cov thwjtim lug has rua Yexu tas, “Yuav ca peb npaaj kevcai Hlaa Dhau  rua koj noj hovtwg?”

Nwg has tas, “Ca le moog cuag ib tug yawm huv lub nroog hab has rua nwg tas, ‘Tug xwbfwb has tas, Lub swjhawm kws teem rua kuv lug ze lawm. Kuv yuav nrug kuv cov thwjtim ua kevcai Hlaa Dhau rua huv koj lub tsev.’ ”
Cov thwjtim kuj ua lawv le Yexu has, puab txawm moog npaaj ua kevcai Hlaa Dhau txhwj zog.
Thaus tsaus ntuj Yexu nrug kaum ob tug thwjtim nyob pheeb ntawm rooj mov ua ke.
Thaus puab saamswm noj, nwg txawm has tas, “Kuv has tseeb rua mej tas, mej cov nuav muaj ib tug yuav faav xeeb rua kuv.”
Puab kuj ntxhuv sab heev puab nyag taug nyag chiv nug tas, “Tug Tswv, yog kuv lov?”
Yexu teb tas, “Tug kws cev nwg txhais teg nrug kuv koom ntsw ib lub taig yog tug kws yuav faav xeeb rua kuv.
Tuabneeg leej Tub yuav moog lawv le tej kws muaj sau ca has txug nwg, tassws tug kws faav xeeb rua Tuabneeg leej Tub yeej yuav raug txom nyem kawg. Tsw xob yug nwg lug kuj zoo dua.”
Yutas kws faav xeeb rua Yexu txawm has tas, “Xwbfwb,  yog kuv lov?” Yexu teb nwg tas, “Koj has yog lawm.”
Thaus puab noj mov, Yexu txawm muab ib lub ncuav lug foom koob moov rua mas muab ndais cev rua cov thwjtim hab has tas, “Ca le txais moog noj, nuav yog kuv lub cev.”
Hab nwg muab ib lub khob lug ua Vaajtswv tsaug taag muab cev rua puab has tas, “Mej txhua tug ca le haus lub khob nuav.
Nuav yog kuv cov ntshaav kws nas hom thawj rua tej lug cog tseg, kws raug muab nchuav daws tuabneeg coob coob lub txem.
Kuv has rua mej tas kuv yuav tsw haus cawv txwv maab nuav dua le moog txug nub kws kuv nrug mej haus cawv txwv maab tshab huv kuv leej Txwv lub tebchaws.”
Thaus puab hu ib zaaj nkauj taag puab tawm moog rua peg roob Txwv Aulib.
Thaus ntawd Yexu has rua puab tas, “Mo nuav mej txhua tug yuav tso kuv tseg, vem muaj lug sau ca has tas, “ ‘Kuv yuav tua tug yug yaaj, mas paab yaaj yuav tawg ua saab ua sua moog.’
Tassws thaus kuv raug muab tsaa caj sawv rov lug lawm, kuv yuav ua mej ntej moog rua Kalilai.”
Petu txawm has rua Yexu tas, “Txawm yog puab suavdawg tso koj tseg los kuv yuav tsw tso koj tseg hlo le.”
Yexu has rua nwg tas, “Kuv has tseeb rua koj tas, mo nuav ntaag thaus qab tsw tau qua koj yuav tsw leeg paub kuv peb zag.”
Petu has rua nwg tas, “Txawm yog kuv yuav tsum nrug koj tuag, los kuv yuav tsw has tas kuv tsw paub koj.” Cov thwjtim suavdawg puavleej has le ntawd.
Tes Yexu txawm nrug nwg cov thwjtim moog rua ib qho chaw kws hu ua Kexemane, mas nwg has rua puab tas, “Ca le nyob tsawg ntawm nuav rua thaus kuv moog thov Vaajtswv lawm tod.”
Nwg coj Petu hab Xenpenti ob tug tub nrug nwg moog. Yexu chiv txhawj hab ntxhuv sab kawg.
Yexu has rua puab tas, “Kuv lub sab ntxhuv kawg tub yuav tuag. Mej ca le nyob ntawm nuav hab nrug kuv zuv tog.”

Yexu txawm moog rua tom ntej mivntswv mas nwg khwb nkaus rua huv peg teb thov has tas, “Au kuv leej Txwv, yog ua tau, thov ca lub khob nuav dhau ntawm kuv moog. Txawm le caag kuj xwj, thov tsw xob ca ua lawv le kuv lub sab tassws ca ua lawv le koj lub sab.”
Nwg rov lug rua ntawm cov thwjtim pum puab pw tsaug zug taag. Nwg txhad has rua Petu tas, “Mej nrug kuv zuv tog ib nyuas teev tsw taug le lov?
Mej yuav tsum zuv tog hab thov Vaajtswv sub mej txhad tsw raug kev swm sab. Lub sab npaaj txhwj lawm tassws lub cev tsw muaj zug.”
Yexu txawm rov moog thov Vaajtswv zag ob has tas, “Au kuv leej Txwv, yog lub khob nuav dhau ntawm kuv moog tsw tau, yog kuv yuav tsum haus xwb, mas thov ca ua lawv le koj lub sab.”
Yexu rov lug pum puab pw tsaug zug dua ib zag vem puab qheb tsw taug qhov muag.
Nwg txawm ncaim puab rov moog thov Vaajtswv zag peb ib yaam le thov thawj ob zag.

Nwg txawm rov lug rua ntawm cov thwjtim hab has rua puab tas, “Mej tseed pw tsaug zug hab su lug sav lov? Lub swjhawm tub lug txug lawm, mas Tuabneeg leej Tub tub raug muab cob rua huv cov tuabneeg txhum txhais teg lawm.
Ca le sawv tseeg, peb moog. Saib maj, tug kws faav xeeb rua kuv tuaj ze lawm.”

Thaus Yexu tseed saamswm has lug, tes Yutas kws yog ib tug thwjtim huv kaum ob leeg ntawd txawm tuaj txug, hab muaj tuabneeg coob coob coj ntaaj coj qws nrug nwg tuaj, yog cov pov thawj hlub hab cov kev txwj quas laug khaiv tuaj.
Tug kws faav xeeb hov tub qha rua puab ua ntej tas, “Kuv nwj tug twg mas yog tug hov ntaag. Ca le nteg kag nwg.”
Taamswm ntawd Yutas txawm lug rua ntawm Yexu hab has tas, “Nyob zoo, xwbfwb,”  hab nwj Yexu.
Yexu has rua nwg tas, “Kwvluag, ca le ua lawv le koj xaav tseg lawm.”  Tes cov tuabneeg hov txawm lug ntsab nkaus Yexu muab nwg nteg.
Thaus hov muaj ib tug kws nrug nraim Yexu txawm cev teg rhu hlo ntaaj lug tuab ntaug tug tuam pov thawj hlub tug tub qhe txav nwg ib saab nplooj ntseg tu nrho.
Yexu has rua nwg tas, “Ca le muab koj raab ntaaj ntxwg rua huv lub naab, vem tas txhua tug kws swv ntaaj yeej yuav tuag rua nav ntaaj.
Mej xaav tas kuv yuav thov kuv leej Txwv tsw tau lov? Mas nwg yuav tso tubkhai ntuj coob dua kaum ob paab tub rog  lug paab kuv taamswm ntawd.
Yog ua le ntawd mas tej lug kws has tas yuav tsum muaj le nuav, yuav tav tau le caag?”
Thaus ntawd Yexu has rua cov tuabneeg tas, “Mej coj ntaaj coj qws tuaj nteg kuv ib yaam le tawm moog nteg tub saab lov? Kuv naj nub nyob tsawg huv lub tuam tsev qhuab qha, los mej tsua tsw nteg kuv.
Tassws tej xwm txheej nuav huvsw tshwm lug txhad tav lawv le tej lug kws cov xwbfwb cev lug sau ca.” Tes cov thwjtim suavdawg txawm tso Yexu tseg tswv taag lawm.
Cov kws nteg Yexu txawm coj nwg moog rua ntawm tug tuam pov thawj hlub Khayafa. Cov xwbfwb qha Vaajtswv kevcai hab cov kev txwj quas laug tub tuaj txoos ua ke rua hov ntawd lawm.

Petu lawv Yexu qaab deb deb moog txug lub tshaav puam ntawm tug tuam pov thawj hlub lub tsev. Nwg nkaag moog nrug cov tub rog kws zuv lub tuam tsev nyob ua ke rua huv xauj, saib thaus kawg yuav zoo le caag.
Cov pov thawj hlub hab taag nrho cov thawj lub rooj sablaaj txawm nrhav cuav timkhawv nkaug Yexu sub txhad tua tau nwg pov tseg.
Txawm yog muaj ntau leej lug ua cuav timkhawv tum los nrhav tsw tau keeb puam. Thaus kawg muaj ob leeg lug,
hab has tas, “Tug nuav has tas, ‘Kuv yuav rhuav Vaajtswv lub tuam tsev pov tseg mas peb nub xwb yuav ua tau dua tshab.’ ”
Tug tuam pov thawj hlub txawm sawv tseeg has tas, “Koj tsw muaj ib lu lug teb lov? Puab kom koj txug daabtsw?”
Yexu nyob tuabywv. Tug tuam pov thawj hlub txawm has tas, “Kuv ca koj tuav Vaajtswv kws muaj txujsa nyob lub npe twv has rua peb tas koj yog tug Kheto kws yog Vaajtswv tug Tub los tsw yog.”
Yexu has rua nwg tas, “Yog le koj has. Tassws kuv has rua mej tas, tom hauv ntej mej yuav pum Tuabneeg leej Tub nyob tsawg ntawm tug kws muaj fwjchim luj kawg saab xws, hab nrug fuab sau ntuj lug.”
Tes tug tuam pov thawj hlub txawm dua rhe nwg lub tsho hab has tas, “Nwg has lug tuam mom Vaajtswv lawm. Peb tseed yuav timkhawv ntxwv le caag hab? Mej tub nov nwg has tuam mom Vaajtswv lawm.
Mej pum zoo le caag?” Puab teb tas, “Tswm nyog muab teem txem tuag.”
Puab txawm ntu qub ncaug rua Yexu ntsej muag hab ntaus nwg hab muaj qee leej xuas tawg ncuav rua Yexu,
hab has tas, “Tug Kheto, ca le cev Vaajtswv lug rua peb. Saib leejtwg ntaus koj?”
Petu nyob tsawg nrau lub tshaav puam. Muaj ib tug nkauj qhev lug has rua nwg tas, “Koj tub nrug Yexu kws yog tuabneeg Kalilai ua ke los sas.”
Tassws Petu tsw leeg taab meeg suavdawg, nwg has tas, “Qhov kws koj has kod kuv tsw paub le.”

Thaus Petu tawm moog rua ntawm rooj vaag muaj dua ib tug nkauj qhev txawm pum nwg tes txawm has rua cov tuabneeg kws nyob ib ncig ntawd tas, “Tug nuav yeej nrug Yexu kws yog tuabneeg Naxale nyob ua ke.”
Petu rov tsw leeg hab twv has tas, “Kuv yeej tsw paub tug hov le.”
Tom qaab ntawd mivntswv cov tuabneeg kws nyob ib ncig txawm lug has rua Petu tas, “Koj yeej yog puab cov hov ib tug tag tag le, tsua qhov koj lub suab seebchim yeej qha rua peb paub lawm.”
Petu txawm chiv twv tsawm tawv tawv has tas, “Kuv tsw paub tug hov hlo le.” Taamswm ntawd qab txawm qua.
Petu txhad ncu dheev txug tej lug kws Yexu tau has tas, “Thaus qab tsw tau qua koj yuav tsw leeg paub kuv peb zag.” Tes Petu txawm moog rua saab nrau quaj nyuaj sab heev.
Thaus sawv ntxuv cov pov thawj hlub suavdawg hab cov kev txwj quas laug sablaaj yuav muab Yexu tua pov tseg.
Puab txawm muab nwg khi coj moog cob rua Philaj kws yog tug tswv xeev.
Thaus Yutas kws faav xeeb rua Yexu pum tas Yexu raug teem txem nwg txawm ntxeev dua sab hab coj peb caug lub nyaj hov tuaj thim rua cov pov thawj hlub hab cov kev txwj quas laug,
has tas, “Kuv tau ua txhum qhov kws tau muab tug kws tsw txhum cob rua luas tua.” Puab has tas, “Tej kod ntswg txug peb daabtsw? Koj ca le ua le kws koj pum zoo xwb.”
Yutas txawm muab cov nyaj hov pov rua huv lub tuam tsev mas tawm moog lawm. Nwg txawm moog dai cej daab tuag.
Cov pov thawj hlub txawm khaws cov nyaj hov lug mas has tas, “Qhov kws muab cov nyaj nuav ca rua huv lub txhaab nyaj tuam tsev kuj tsw raug cai tsua qhov yog nqe ntshaav.”
Thaus puab sablaaj has hum lawm, puab txawm coj cov nyaj hov moog yuav tug Kws Puab Laujkaub Aav daim teb ca ua toj ntxaa log lwm haiv tuabneeg.
Vem le nuav luas txhad hu daim teb hov tas Daim Teb Ntshaav lug txug naj nub nwgnuav.
Qhov nuav kuj tav lawv le tej lug kws xwbfwb Yelemi cev Vaajtswv lug has tas, “Puab txais peb caug lub nyaj hov kws yog tug hov le nqe kws cov Yixayee qee leej ntaus nqe ca lawd,
mas coj moog yuav tug Kws Puab Laujkaub Aav daim teb lawv le tug Tswv tau has tseg ca rua kuv.”
Thaus Yexu sawv ntawm tug tswv xeev xubndag, tug tswv xeev nug tas, “Koj yog cov Yutai tug vaajntxwv lov?” Yexu has tas, “Yog le koj has.”
Tassws thaus cov pov thawj hlub hab cov kev txwj quas laug kom, Yexu tsw teb ib lus le.
Philaj txawm has rua nwg tas, “Koj tsw nov tej lug kws puab kom koj ntau yaam le lov?”
Tassws Yexu tsw teb puab tej lug kom ib lus le, tug tswv xeev kuj phemfwj heev.
Lawv le ib txwm txhua zag kws ua kevcai Hlaa Dhau tug tswv xeev yuav tso ib tug raug txem dim lawv le cov pejxeem pum zoo.
Zag hov muaj ib tug raug txem hu ua [Yexu]  Npalanpa kws sauvdawg paub.
Thaus cov pejxeem tuaj txoos ua ke, Philaj has rua puab tas, “Mej xaav kuas kuv tso leejtwg dim, [Yexu] Npalanpa lossws Yexu kws hu ua Kheto?”
Philaj paub tas puab khib txhad muab Yexu cob rua nwg.
Thaus Philaj nyob tsawg has plaub hov, nwg tug quaspuj has tuaj rua nwg tas, “Tsw xob ntswg txug tug ncaaj nceeg hov hlo le, tsua qhov nub nua kuv ua npau suav txug nwg ua rua kuv nyuaj sab heev.”
Cov pov thawj hlub hab cov kev txwj quas laug haub cov pejxeem kuas thov tso Npalanpa es muab Yexu tua pov tseg.
Tug tswv xeev rov has rua puab tas, “Ob tug nuav mej xaav kuas kuv tso tug twg?” Puab teb tas, “Npalanpa.”
Philaj txawm has tas, “Yog le hov kuv yuav ua le caag rua Yexu kws hu tas Kheto?” Puab suavdawg has tas, “Muab teem rua sau khaublig ntoo.”
Philaj txhad has tas, “Ua caag muab teem? Nwg tau ua txhum daabtsw?” Tassws puab yimfuab qw has tas, “Muab nwg teem rua sau khaublig ntoo.”

Thaus Philaj pum tas tsw tau qaabhau tsuas muaj kev kub ntxhuv tuaj xwb, nwg txawm muab dej lug ntxuav teg taab meeg cov tuabneeg hov has tas, “Kuv tsw txhum tsua qhov kws tug nuav tuag. Mej ua mej xwb.”
Ib tsoom tuabneeg teb tas, “Ca tug hov cov ntshaav poob rua sau peb hab peb tej mivnyuas.”
Philaj txhad tso Npalanpa rua puab, mas muab Yexu nplawm hab muab cob rua luas coj moog teem rua sau khaublig ntoo.
Tug tswv xeev cov tub rog txawm coj Yexu moog rua huv lub tsev Plitholia,  mas sau hlo paab tub rog suavdawg tuaj vej nkaus Yexu.
Puab muab nwg cev tsoog hle tseg hab muab ib lub tsho ntev lab lug ua rua Yexu naav.

Puab muab xuav paug ntsaaj lug qhab ua ib lub mom vaajntxwv looj nwg taubhau, hab muab ib tug lojkov rua nwg tuav huv nwg txhais teg xws. Puab txhus caug ndua ntawm nwg xubndag thuaj luag has tas, “Cov Yutai tug vaajntxwv, thov kuas koj tau zoo lauj!”
Puab ntu qub ncaug rua nwg hab muab tug lojkov lug ntaus nwg taubhau.
Thaus puab ua saib tsw taug Yexu taag lawd, puab muab lub tsho ntev hle hab rov muab nwg cev tsoog ua rua nwg naav, hab coj nwg moog yuav muab teem rua sau khaublig ntoo.
Thaus puab tawm moog puab ntswb ib tug tuabneeg Khulene hu ua Ximoo, puab txawm yuam nwg kwv Yexu tug khaublig ntoo.
Thaus puab moog txug lub chaw kws hu ua Kaukautha kws txhais has tas lub chaw txhaa taubhau,
puab txawm muab cawv txwv maab xyaw maab dib ab cev rua Yexu haus. Thaus nwg swm mivntswv lawd nwg tsw kaam haus.
Thaus puab muab Yexu teem rua sau khaublig ntoo lawd, puab txawm muab nwg cev tsoog tsho lug rhu ntawv sws faib rua puab.
Tes puab txawm nyob tsawg hov ntawd zuv nwg.
Puab muab cov lug kws kom Yexu sau teem ncaaj rua sau nwg taubhau has tas, “Tug nuav yog Yexu, yog cov Yutai tug vaajntxwv.”
Zag hov puab muab ob tug tub saab teem nrug Yexu ua ke hab, saab xws ib tug, saab phem ib tug.
Tej tuabneeg kws dua kev moog lug kuj thuaj Yexu cu hau quas nyo,
has tas, “Tug kws yuav rhuav lub tuam tsev hab peb nub xwb ua dua tshab 'e, koj ca le cawm koj tug kheej kuas dim los maj. Yog koj yog Vaajtswv tug Tub, ca le nqeg sau khaublig ntoo lug los maj.”
Cov pov thawj hlub hab cov xwbfwb qha Vaajtswv kevcai hab cov kev txwj quas laug kuj thuaj luag nwg ib yaam nkaus has tas,
“Nwg cawm tau luas dim, tassws nwg cawm tsw tau nwg dim. Nwg yog cov Yixayee tug vaajntxwv. Ca nwg nqeg sau khaublig ntoo lug taamswm nuav mas peb txhad le ntseeg nwg.
Nwg tso sab rua Vaajtswv. Yog Vaajtswv txaus sab rua nwg, thov Vaajtswv tso nwg dim taamswm nuav. Tsua qhov nwg tub has tas, ‘Kuv yog Vaajtswv tug Tub.’ ”
Ob tug tub saab kws raug muab teem nrug Yexu kuj thuaj nwg ib yaam nkaus hab.
Ntuj txawm tsaus ndais thoob plawg lub tebchaws txwj thaus taav su moog txug nub qaij peb teev.
Kwvlaam peb teev Yexu qw nrov nrov has tas, “Eli, eli, Lama xanpathani?” txhais has tas, “Kuv tug Vaajtswv, kuv tug Vaajtswv ua caag koj tso kuv tseg lawm?”
Thaus cov tuabneeg kws nyob ntawd qee leej nov tes txawm has tas, “Tug yawm hov hu Eliya.”
Taamswm ntawd ib tug dha moog muab ib lub xwb kuab raus cov kua qaub  chob rua tug hauv paas lojkov cev moog rua Yexu haus.
Tassws muaj dua ib cov has tas, “Tsw xob ua daabtsw, ca peb saib Eliya yuav lug cawm nwg los tsw lug.”
Thaus Yexu rov qw nrov dua ib zag tes nwg txawm tso nwg txujsa tseg.
Na cav daim ntaub kws thaiv huv lub tuam tsev txawm nduag rhe saab sau lug thoob plawg huv taw ua ob daim, aav kuj tseeg ua zug quas kais, tej txhwb zeb kuj tawg zum zawg,
tej qhov ntxaa kuj qheb, hab Vaajtswv cov tuabneeg kws tuag lawd raug muab tsaa sawv lug.
Mas thaus Yexu caj sawv lug lawd, puab cov ntawd kuj tawm huv qhov ntxaa moog rua huv lub nroog dawb huv tshwm rua tuabneeg coob coob pum.

Thaus tug thawj rog kws kaav ib puas leej hab cov kws nrug nwg zuv Yexu pum aav tseeg quas nkawg hab txhua yaam tshwm tuaj le nuav, mas puab ntshai kawg le hab has tas, “Tug nuav yog Vaajtswv tug tub tag tag le.”
Hov ntawd muaj cov quaspuj coob coob sawv deb deb saib, puab yog cov kws nrug Yexu tuaj peg Kalilai tuaj hab ua koom rua nwg.
Huv puab cov hov muaj Maivlag Mantala, hab Yakaunpau hab Yauxej nam, hab Xenpenti ob tug tub le nam.
Thaus yuav tsaus ntuj muaj ib tug nplua nuj kws nyob huv lub moos Alimathia hu ua Yauxej tuaj, nwg kuj yog Yexu le thwjtim.
Nwg moog cuag Philaj thov Yexu lub cev tuag. Philaj txhad has kuas muab cob rua nwg.
Yauxej txawm muab Yexu lub cev tuag lug hab muab ib daim ntaub maag kws huv lug qhwv,
coj moog tso rua huv Yauxej lub qhov ntxaa tshab kws nwg txaug ca rua huv phaab zeb, mas dov ib daim laag zeb luj npug lub rooj ntxaa tes txawm moog lawm.
Maivlag Mantala hab dua ib tug Maivlag kuj nyob tsawg hov ntawd ncaaj ntawm lub rooj ntxaa.
Taagkig tom qaab dhau nub kws npaaj rua nub Xanpatau lawm, cov pov thawj hlub hab cov Falixai ua ke tuaj cuag Philaj
has tas, “Yawm hlub, peb ncu tau tas tug tuabneeg daag hov thaus nwg tseed muaj txujsa nyob nwg has tas, ‘Dhau peb nub mas kuv yuav caj sawv rov lug.’

Yog le hov thov koj has kuas zuv lub qhov ntxaa ruaj ruaj kuas puv peb nub, ntshai tsaam nwg cov thwjtim tuaj nyag nwg lub cev moog hab has rua cov pejxeem tas, ‘Nwg tub sawv caj huv qhov tuag rov lug lawm.’ Tes qhov kws daag zag nuav yuav phem heev dua thawj zag.”
Philaj txhad has rua puab tas, “Tub rog zuv yeej yog mej le, mas mej ca le moog zuv ruaj ruaj npaum le kws ua tau.”
Puab txawm moog ntaus hom thawj rua daim laag zeb kaw lub rooj ntxaa ruaj ruaj hab tso tub rog zuv.
Thaus dhau nub Xanpatau lawm, nub ib  thaus kaaj ntug txoog Maivlag Mantala hab dua ib tug Maivlag txawm moog saib lub qhov ntxaa.
Na cav ntuj txawm qeg tseeg quas nkawg heev. Tug Tswv ib tug tubkhai ntuj nqeg lug muab daim laag zeb dov tawm, tes txawm nyob tsawg sau daim laag zeb hov.
Saib tug tubkhai hov mas zoo le tsag lig xub hab nwg cev tsoog tsho dawb paug le daus xwb daus npu.
Cov tub rog kws zuv ntxaa ntshai tug tubkhai ntuj hov tshee quas nyo hab zoo yaam le tuabneeg tuag.
Tug tubkhai ntuj txhad has rua cov quaspuj tas, “Tsw xob ntshai, kuv paub tas meb tuaj nrhav Yexu kws raug muab teem rua sau tug khaublig ntoo.
Nwg tsw nyob ntawm nuav, nwg tub caj sawv lug lawm lawv le nwg tub has tseg lawd. Ca le lug saib lub chaw kws nwg pw.
Hab maaj nroog moog has rua nwg cov thwjtim tas, ‘Nwg tub caj sawv huv qhov tuag rov lug lawm, nwg yuav ua mej ntej moog rua peg Kalilai. Mej yuav pum nwg hov ntawd.’ Nuav yog kuv has rua meb ntaag.”
Ob tug txawm tawm huv lub qhov ntxaa sai sai ntshai hab zoo sab hab dha moog qha rua Yexu cov thwjtim.
Na cav Yexu txawm ntswb ob tug hab has tas, “Nyob zoo lov?” Ob tug txawm lug ze tuav nkaus Yexu kwtaw pe hawm nwg.
Yexu has rua ob tug tas, “Tsw xob ntshai, ca le moog has rua kuv cov kwvtij kuas moog rua Kalilai, puab yuav ntswb kuv hov ntawd.”
Thaus cov quaspuj hov saamswm moog cov tub rog kws zuv lub ntxaa qee leej kuj moog rua huv nroog hab qha txhua yaam xwm kws tshwm lug rua cov pov thawj hlub.
Thaus cov pov thawj hlub hab cov kev txwj quas laug tuaj ua ke sablaaj ua ke taag lawd puab txawm muab nyaj ntau ntsaws rua cov tub rog
hab has tas, “Mej ca le has tas, ‘Thaus tsaus ntuj kws peb tsaug zug lawm Yexu cov thwjtim tuaj nyag nwg lub cev tuag coj moog lawm.’
Yog tug tswv xeev nov txug tej nuav, peb le maav nrug nwg has, tsw pub mej raug teeb meem.”
Cov tub rog txawm txais cov nyaj hov hab ua lawv le puab qha. Mas zaaj nuav nchaa moog rua huv cov Yutai txug naj nub nwgnuav.
Kaum ib tug thwjtim txawm moog rua peg Kalilai moog txug lub roob kws Yexu has rua puab.
Thaus puab pum Yexu puab pe hawm nwg, tassws muaj qee leej tseed ua xyem xyaav.
Yexu txawm txaav lug ze hab has rua puab tas, “Fwjchim taag nrho sau ntuj hab huv nplajteb tub muab cob rua kuv lawm.
Yog le nuav mej ca le moog coj txhua haiv tuabneeg lug ua kuv le thwjtim, hab muab puab ua kevcai raus dej huv leej Txwv, leej Tub hab Vaaj Ntsuj Plig kws dawb huv lub npe,
hab qha kuas puab tuav rawv txhua yaam kws kuv tau qha rua mej lawd. Hab kuv naj nub yuav nrug nraim mej moog txug lub swjhawm kawg.”
